title: Help me
body: guys my net dced and i couldn't go back to the game so they give me 10 mins waiting forever i have so much skins in the account and my friends wont play with me cuz they dont want to wait please help what should i do :(

replies.body: If I were you I'd take this time to investigate whatever is causing the disconnection.  The 10-minute lower priority queue would only happen after multiple leaves, and I'd like to help figure out what's going wrong if I can.  Are you receiving any errors or crashes?  It's important that we get this fixed up, so the queue time stops escalating and get you back in game with your friends.
My internet used to crash a lot, I fixed it now.
